query: SELECT name, programName, dailyCredit, eventPayment, estimatedEventsPerYear, bundleDiscount, ROUND(dailyCredit * 365 + eventPayment * estimatedEventsPerYear + bundleDiscount, 2) as calculatedAnnualValue, availableStates, hasGasBundle FROM vppProviders WHERE isActive = 1 ORDER BY calculatedAnnualValue DESC;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2p3K1dfddpGHimM.570595ac1fed --database P6CTqT8eNBMi3wEqmJdcEm --execute SELECT name, programName, dailyCredit, eventPayment, estimatedEventsPerYear, bundleDiscount, ROUND(dailyCredit * 365 + eventPayment * estimatedEventsPerYear + bundleDiscount, 2) as calculatedAnnualValue, availableStates, hasGasBundle FROM vppProviders WHERE isActive = 1 ORDER BY calculatedAnnualValue DESC;
